author: Defense World Staff
title: Mercialys (OTCMKTS:MEIYF) Trading Up 22.3% - Defense World
text: Mercialys SA ( [OTCMKTS:MEIYF](https://www.marketbeat.com/stocks/OTCMKTS/MEIYF/) â€“ [Get Free Report](https://www.marketbeat.com/arnreports/ReportTickerOptin.aspx?RegistrationCode=TickerHyperlink&Prefix=OTCMKTS&Symbol=MEIYF)) was up 22.3% on Friday . The stock traded as high as $11.35 and last traded at $11.35. Approximately 857 shares were traded during trading, an increase of 18% from the average daily volume of 729 shares. The stock had previously closed at $9.28. Mercialys Trading Up 22.3 % The business has a 50-day moving average of $9.24 and a two-hundred day moving average of $8.65. Mercialys Company Profile Mercialys is one of France's leading real estate companies. It is specialized in the holding, management and transformation of retail spaces, anticipating consumer trends, on its own behalf and for third parties. At June 30, 2023, Mercialys had a real estate portfolio valued at Euro 3.0 billion (including transfer taxes).
